explanation: [0-0] The video is divided into upper and lower parts. The upper part is a black screen. The lower part has a pure white background with a red laughing worm facing left.

[0-6] The upper part of the screen gradually appears, showing an astronaut riding a spaceship. The astronaut is standing outside the cabin, with the Earth below. Below the astronaut, there is a broken heart emoji and the English words "LORDSAMURAI." Then the camera rotates left and right along with the music, showing a small person on the left stacking stones under his feet. Above the person is the English name "Sandaluwu." With the vibration of the music, the red worm in the lower part of the video suddenly wears a green hat. At the same time, the little person looks up at the camera, the broken heart below turns into a repaired heart, and then the little person dances to the music. The screen gradually fades to black.
